message_1: Evaluate the expression 3x² - 5xy + 2y² if x = 4 and y = 2.
message_2:
To evaluate the expression, substitute the given values of x and y into the expression and then simplify.

3x² - 5xy + 2y²

= 3(4)² - 5(4)(2) + 2(2)²
= 3(16) - 5(8) + 2(4)
= 48 - 40 + 8
= 8 + 8
= 16

The value of the expression 3x² - 5xy + 2y² when x = 4 and y = 2 is 16.
